Hooks::​Game
namespace Hooks::Game {...}
Variables
EntityCreated
const uint32 Hooks::Game::EntityCreated

Called when a new entity is created. At this point the entity is not spawned yet and may not be fully initialized.

MapChange
const uint32 Hooks::Game::MapChange

Called when the map changes. This happens when the world is destroyed. There may still be entities that exist at this point. String will show the next map will be, or empty if the server is shutting down.
